metadata.title: CVE-2021-21207 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in IndexedDB in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.72 allowedan attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
